advancements.sculkevolution.pandoras_box: Unlock an Umbra Vault using an Umbra Key, then face the consequences
Releases a sonic boom at the cost of all the sculk built up by the sickle.
enchantment.sculkevolution.soul_lunge.de: Uses a small amount of the sickle's built up sculk to dash forward.
enchantment.sculkevolution.rejuvenate.de: Purifies a small portion of the sickle's sculk, healing the user. Can also be used similarly to bone meal while sneaking.
enchantment.sculkevolution.intensity.des: Boosts the sickle's damage scaling per hit by 0.5 per level.
enchantment.sculkevolution.repulse.desc: Prevents the sickle from losing all its sculk when hit, at the cost of a cooldown. Higher levels lessen the cooldown.
